name: Shepherd's Tale - Updated Version
description:
Made by me and https://yoris01.itch.io/ during the course of 4 months

WASD - Move

E - Interact

Q - Menu/cancel

Left shift - Sprint

1, 2, 3 - Hotbar slots although we forgot to make stuff equippable in the 3rd slot lol nice

To earn gold, stand close to a shopkeeper and enable selling mode in your inventory.

To win the game, find all 9 sheep and return them to the fenced area at the start.

All sheep locations if you are lazy or can't find the last one: https://imgur.com/a/L76HDHf
